TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridViewDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner

summary.span: 在可视化设计器中为 控件提供设计时支持。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在可视化设计器中，当从源视图切换到设计视图中，标记源代码，介绍了控件进行分析，并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 在切换到源视图时，设计时控件的标记源代码持久保存，并编辑到 Web 页的标记。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. 属性类提供了以下功能：The properties of the class provide the following functionality: - 属性返回对象，它通常包含一个对象，派生自继承树中每个级别的设计器的类。The property returns a object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer. - 属性返回的格式设置中显示的方案集合**自动套用格式**对话框。The property returns a collection of formatting schemes for display in the **Auto Format** dialog box. - 属性返回的字段关联的模板组集合控制和顶级模板。The property returns a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated control and the top-level templates. - 属性始终返回`true`，，该值指示设计器创建关联的临时副本来生成设计时标记。The property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated to generate the design-time markup. 方法类提供了以下功能：The methods of the class provide the following functionality: - 方法将绑定关联与设计时数据源的控件。The method binds the associated control to a design-time data source. - 方法返回用于呈现关联的标记在设计时。The method returns the markup that is used to render the associated at design time. - 方法准备设计器，以查看、 编辑和设计关联。The method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated . - 关联的设计时视图的区域时，调用方法单击。The method is called when a region of the design-time view of the associated is clicked. - 时调用方法关联的数据源的架构更改。The method is called when the schema of the data source of the associated changes. - 方法用于移除或添加属性或者隐藏关联的属性。The method is used to remove or add properties or to shadow properties of the associated . 设计时可编辑区域中不支持控件，因此和方法具有任何功能。Design-time editable regions are not supported in the control, so the and methods have no functionality. ## Examples 以下代码示例演示如何扩展类，以更改由派生的控件的外观控件在设计时。The following code example shows how to extend the class to change the appearance of controls that are derived from the control at design time. 该示例从`MyGridView`控件从。The example derives the `MyGridView` control from the . `MyGridView`只是一个副本的。The `MyGridView` is simply a copy of the . 该示例还从`MyGridViewDesigner`类派生类和位数对象`MyGridViewDesigner`上`MyGridView`控件。The example also derives the `MyGridViewDesigner` class from the class and places a object for the `MyGridViewDesigner` on the `MyGridView` control. `MyGridViewDesigner`重写方法以使属性中可见**属性**网格在设计时。The `MyGridViewDesigner` overrides the method to make the property visible in the **Properties** grid at design time. 它将替代方法以包括属性，如果它指定的为新的第一行`MyGridView`控件在设计时。It overrides the method to include the property, if it is specified, as a new first row in the `MyGridView` control at design time. 如果的属性`MyGridView`控件具有或值，绘制控件以使其更容易看到周围的蓝色虚线的边框。If the property of the `MyGridView` control has the or value, the draws a blue dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner/CS/gridviewdesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner/VB/gridviewdesigner.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在内部构建的新实例类创建关联时控件或该控件在设计图面上的副本。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control or a copy of that control on the design surface.

The associated with this designer.

span.span: Gets or sets the collection of predefined formatting schemes to display in the **Auto Format** dialog box.

value.span: 一个 ，它包含 的预定义方案。

span.span: A that contains the predefined schemes for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象填充从 XML 编码的内部类的成员。The object is populated from an XML-encoded member of an internal class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void DataBind(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl dataBoundControl) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub DataBind (dataBoundControl As BaseDataBoundControl)

param.name: dataBoundControl
param.span: 要绑定到设计时数据源的 控件。

span.span: The to bind to the design-time data source.

summary.span: 将关联控件绑定到设计时数据源。

span.span: Binds the associated control to the design-time data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将绑定关联控件的设计时数据源，并将分配到的唯一值字段的每个单元格的控件的设计时呈现。The method binds the associated control to the design-time data source and assigns a unique value to the field of each cell of the control's design-time rendering. `dataBoundControl`参数是与此设计器中或该控件的副本相关联的控件。The `dataBoundControl` parameter is the control that is associated with this designer, or a copy of that control.

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时呈现关联的 控件的标记。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时呈现关联控件的标记。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含用于在设计时呈现 的标记。

span.span: A containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法执行以下操作：The method does the following: 1. 集该控件的属性`true`，如果属性为空。Sets the property of the control to `true`, if the property is empty. 2. 集到控件属性`null`，如果无法获取数据源的架构。Sets the property of the control to `null`, if the schema of the data source cannot be obtained. 3. 刷新对象以强制要在调用方法。Refreshes the object to force the method to be called. 4. 调用基方法，以生成标记。Calls the base method to generate the markup. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法的类中继承自类，以更改的外观控件在设计时。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of the control at design time. 该示例向要包含的网格中添加新的第一行属性，如果定义。The example adds a new first row to the grid to contain the property, if the is defined. 如果属性的控件的派生自类具有或值，绘制控件以使其更容易看到周围的蓝色虚线的边框。If the property of the control that is derived from the class has the or value, the draws a blue dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible. 它不会更改控件的运行时外观。It does not change the run-time appearance of the control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner/CS/gridviewdesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner/VB/gridviewdesigner.vb#4)]

span.para: 如果重写方法，请确保调用基方法，因为它最终，经过多级重写时，调用上控件或控件来生成标记的副本。
If you override the method, be sure to call the base method, because it eventually, through several override levels, calls on the control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml(class System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection regions) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml (regions As DesignerRegionCollection) As String

param.name: regions
param.span: 一个 ，将在其中添加控件设计时视图中定义的可选择和可单击区域。

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时呈现关联控件的标记，并填充设计器区域的集合。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time and populates a collection of designer regions.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含用于在设计时呈现 的标记。

span.span: A containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用方法来生成用于在设计时呈现标记控件。The method calls the method to generate the markup for the design-time rendering of the control. 还填充`regions`与为设计时呈现的每个可单击或可选区域的对象。The also populates `regions` with a object for each clickable or selectable region of the design-time rendering. 有关，是可选择的每个行中的第一个单元; 可单击行中的所有单元格。For the , the first cell in each row is selectable; all the cells in the rows are clickable. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法的类中继承自类，以更改的外观控件在设计时。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of the control at design time. 该示例向要包含的网格中添加新的第一行属性，如果定义。The example adds a new first row to the grid to contain the property, if the is defined. 如果属性的控件的派生自类具有或值，绘制控件以使其更容易看到周围的蓝色虚线的边框。If the property of the control that is derived from the class has the or value, the draws a blue dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible. 它不会更改控件的运行时外观。It does not change the run-time appearance of the control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner/CS/gridviewdesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner/VB/gridviewdesigner.vb#4)]

span.para: 如果重写方法，则一定要调用基方法或重载，因为它们最终，经过多级重写时，调用上控件或控件来生成标记的副本。

If you override the method, be sure to call the base method or the overload, because they eventually, through several override levels, call on the control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Initialize (component As IComponent)

span.span: A , which implements an .

summary.span: 准备设计器，以查看、编辑和设计关联的组件。

span.span: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设计器宿主调用方法时它已准备好使用设计器来呈现控件。The designer host calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control. 和其基方法配置属性，并设置所需的设计器的操作的事件。The and its base methods configure properties and set up events that are necessary for the operation of the designer. `component`参数是与此设计器中或一份相关联的控件控件。The `component` parameter is the control that is associated with this designer, or a copy of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnClick(class System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnClick (e As DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs)

param.name: e
param.span: 一个 ，它定义控件的被单击区域。

span.span: A that defines the clicked region of the control.

summary.span: 当单击关联控件设计时视图的区域时，会调用它。

span.span: Called when a region of the design-time view of the associated control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法保存所选的区域索引并更新呈现的标记设计图面上的控件。The method saves the selected region index and updates the markup that renders the control on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnSchemaRefreshed() cil managed

summary.span: 当关联控件的数据源架构更改时，将调用它。

span.span: Called when the schema of the data source for the associated control changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非在设计器处于模板编辑模式或字段是正在添加或编辑，方法调用方法，后者又调用方法来更新控件以反映数据源更改。Unless the designer is in template-editing mode or a field is being added or edited, the method calls the method, which in turn calls the method to update the control to reflect the data source change.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

param.name: properties
param.span: 实现添加的和隐藏的属性的 的集合。

span.span: A collection implementing the of the added and shadowed properties.

summary.span: 供设计器使用，以从“属性”网格的显示中移除属性或向其添加其他属性或者隐藏关联控件的属性。

span.span: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件设计器使用派生自方法来隐藏相应的设计时属性在设计器实现，使用的各种控件属性和将属性添加到或移除属性**属性**网格。Control designers use methods that are derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid. 有关控件，方法设置的对象属性设置为`false`当控件处于模板模式。For the control, the method sets the object of the property to `false` when the control is in template mode. 这可以确保不能使用删除处于模板模式的列**字段**对话框。This is so a column that is in template mode cannot be deleted using the **Fields** dialog box. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法的类中继承自若要更改**属性**网格控件在设计时。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the to change the **Properties** grid of the control at design time. 示例使属性中可见**属性**网格。The example makes the property visible in the **Properties** grid. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner/CS/gridviewdesigner.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner/VB/gridviewdesigner.vb#3)]

span.para: 重写方法将属性添加到或更改设计时属性集合中的属性的特性。请务必在执行其他处理之前调用基方法。
Override the method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection. Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property SampleRowCount As Integer
protected: virtual property int SampleRowCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要显示的关联控件的示例行数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of sample rows for the associated control to display.
The number of sample rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果关联控件允许分页和属性大于 0，属性返回加 1 （但不能大于 100）。If the associated control allows paging and the property is greater than 0, the property returns the plus 1 (but not greater than 100). 如果不允许分页或为 0，返回`5`。If the does not allow paging or the is 0, returns `5`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性构造一系列对象，每个模板化的数据字段和关联中每个控件模板 （寻呼程序和空数据）控件。The property constructs a collection of objects, one for each templated data field and one for each control template (pager and empty data) in the associated control. 数据字段元素具有为每个预定义的行模板类型的对象。The data field elements have a object for each of the predefined row template types. 控件模板元素包含一个。The control template elements contain a single .

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property UsePreviewControl As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool UsePreviewControl { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示设计器是否应使用临时副本取代与设计器关联的实际控件来生成设计时标记。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.

value.span: 如果设计器应使用临时副本（而非与设计器关联的实际控件）来生成设计时标记，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性始终为`true`，该设计器使用控件，其中包含一份关联的控件来生成设计时标记。The property is always `true`, the designer uses a control that contains a copy of the associated control to generate the design-time markup. 控件不会影响任何持久性。The control does not affect any persistence for the . 如果属性已被重写以返回`false`，在设计器将使用关联自身来生成设计时标记，并对控件的设计时更改将保存在页标记源。If the property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer will use the associated itself to generate the design-time markup, and design-time changes to the control will persist to the page markup source.

span.para: 您可以重写属性返回或以确定是否使用类级别标记控件基于其值对象。如果未重写会忽略。
You can override the property to return or to determine its value based on whether the control is marked with a class-level object. If the is not overridden, the ignores the .
